name: Funderful, Inc.
description: Provider of a Web-based alumni fundraising management platform created to help universities manage and grow their annual giving programs. The company's platform displays contributions in a series of real-time infographics, allowing everyone to instantly compare results enabling fundraising organizations to structure, follow, track and analyze the donations campaigns..
one_liner: Provider of a Web-based alumni fundraising management platform created to help universities manage and grow their annual giving programs. The company's platform displays contributions in a series of real-time infographics, allowing everyone to instantly compare results enabling fundraising organizations to structure, follow, track and analyze the donations campaigns..
